description: Tests for backward compatibility of numeric range changes in OpenAPI specifications.

test_cases.name: unchanged
test_cases.description: Tests that the specification remains unchanged.

test_cases.name: changedButCompatible
test_cases.description: Tests that the specification changes but remains compatible.

test_cases.name: requestExclusiveMaxCreated
test_cases.description: Tests that creating an exclusive max in the request makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestExclusiveMaxSet
test_cases.description: Tests that setting an exclusive max in the request makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestExclusiveMinCreated
test_cases.description: Tests that creating an exclusive min in the request makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestExclusiveMinSet
test_cases.description: Tests that setting an exclusive min in the request makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestMaxAdded
test_cases.description: Tests that adding a max in the request makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestMaxDecreased
test_cases.description: Tests that decreasing the max in the request makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestMinAdded
test_cases.description: Tests that adding a min in the request makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestMinIncreased
test_cases.description: Tests that increasing the min in the request makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: responseExclusiveMaxDeleted
test_cases.description: Tests that deleting an exclusive max in the response makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: responseExclusiveMaxUnset
test_cases.description: Tests that unsetting an exclusive max in the response makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: responseExclusiveMinDeleted
test_cases.description: Tests that deleting an exclusive min in the response makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: responseExclusiveMinUnset
test_cases.description: Tests that unsetting an exclusive min in the response makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: responseMaxDeleted
test_cases.description: Tests that deleting the max in the response makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: responseMaxIncreased
test_cases.description: Tests that increasing the max in the response makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: responseMinDecreased
test_cases.description: Tests that decreasing the min in the response makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: responseMinDeleted
test_cases.description: Tests that deleting the min in the response makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of valid OpenAPI specification files.
